templates.name: Dust Surfaces
templates.description: Remove dust from all living room surfaces including tables, shelves, and decorations
templates.health_impact: Reduces allergens and improves indoor air quality
templates.scientific_source: American Academy of Allergy, Asthma & Immunology
templates.ai_explanation: Weekly dusting removes allergens that can trigger respiratory issues. Dust contains dust mites, pet dander, and other particles that can cause allergies and asthma symptoms.

subtasks.title: Dust tables and surfaces
subtasks.description: Remove dust from coffee tables, side tables, and other surfaces

subtasks.title: Dust shelves and bookcases
subtasks.description: Clean dust from shelves, bookcases, and decorative items

subtasks.title: Dust decorations and frames
subtasks.description: Clean picture frames, vases, and decorative items

templates.name: Vacuum Carpets/Floors
templates.description: Thoroughly vacuum all carpeted areas and hard floors in the living room
templates.health_impact: Removes dirt, allergens, and improves air quality
templates.ai_explanation: Weekly vacuuming removes dirt, dust mites, and allergens that accumulate in carpets and on floors. This significantly improves indoor air quality and reduces allergy symptoms.

subtasks.title: Vacuum carpets thoroughly
subtasks.description: Vacuum all carpeted areas with multiple passes

subtasks.title: Vacuum hard floors
subtasks.description: Vacuum hardwood, tile, or laminate floors

subtasks.title: Vacuum edges and corners
subtasks.description: Clean along baseboards and in corners

templates.name: Clean Windows
templates.description: Clean living room windows and glass surfaces for better visibility and appearance
templates.health_impact: Improves natural light and removes environmental pollutants
templates.ai_explanation: Monthly window cleaning removes environmental pollutants and improves natural light penetration. Clean windows also enhance the overall appearance of your living space.

subtasks.title: Apply glass cleaner
subtasks.description: Spray glass cleaner on window surfaces

subtasks.title: Wipe windows clean
subtasks.description: Use squeegee and paper towels to clean windows

subtasks.title: Clean window frames
subtasks.description: Wipe down window frames and sills

templates.name: Disinfect Remote Controls
templates.description: Clean and disinfect TV and electronic remote controls to prevent germ spread
templates.health_impact: Prevents spread of germs and bacteria from high-touch surfaces
templates.ai_explanation: Remote controls are high-touch surfaces that can harbor bacteria and viruses. Weekly disinfection prevents the spread of germs, especially important during cold and flu season.

subtasks.title: Remove batteries
subtasks.description: Remove batteries from remote controls

subtasks.title: Wipe remote control
subtasks.description: Use disinfectant wipes to clean remote surface

subtasks.title: Clean between buttons
subtasks.description: Clean between and around buttons carefully

templates.name: Organize Objects/Decorations
templates.description: Organize and arrange decorative items and objects in the living room
templates.health_impact: Improves mental well-being through organized living space
templates.ai_explanation: An organized living space reduces stress and improves mental well-being. Regular organization prevents clutter buildup and creates a more pleasant living environment.

subtasks.title: Sort and categorize items
subtasks.description: Sort decorative items by type and purpose

subtasks.title: Arrange decorations
subtasks.description: Place items in organized and visually appealing arrangements

templates.name: Wash Dishes
templates.description: Clean all dishes, utensils, and kitchen items after use
templates.health_impact: Prevents foodborne illness and maintains kitchen hygiene
templates.ai_explanation: Daily dish washing prevents the growth of harmful bacteria that can cause foodborne illness. Clean dishes are essential for food safety and kitchen hygiene.

subtasks.title: Scrape food residue
subtasks.description: Remove food particles from dishes before washing

subtasks.title: Wash dishes with soap
subtasks.description: Clean dishes with dish soap and warm water

subtasks.title: Rinse dishes thoroughly
subtasks.description: Rinse all soap residue from dishes

templates.name: Clean Countertops and Surfaces
templates.description: Wipe down all kitchen countertops and food preparation surfaces
templates.ai_explanation: Daily counter cleaning prevents cross-contamination of harmful bacteria. Food preparation surfaces must be kept clean to ensure food safety and prevent illness.

subtasks.title: Clear all surfaces
subtasks.description: Remove all items from countertops

subtasks.title: Wipe down countertops
subtasks.description: Clean all counter surfaces with disinfectant

subtasks.title: Clean sink area
subtasks.description: Clean sink and surrounding area

templates.name: Clean the Stove
templates.description: Clean stovetop, burners, and oven to maintain cooking safety
templates.health_impact: Prevents fire hazards and maintains cooking efficiency
templates.ai_explanation: Daily stove cleaning prevents grease buildup that can cause fires. A clean stove also cooks more efficiently and prevents food contamination.

subtasks.title: Clean burner grates
subtasks.description: Remove and clean burner grates and caps

subtasks.title: Wipe stovetop surface
subtasks.description: Clean the stovetop surface thoroughly

subtasks.title: Clean control knobs
subtasks.description: Wipe down control knobs and panel

templates.name: Empty Trash Bin
templates.description: Remove and replace trash bags to prevent odors and bacteria growth
templates.health_impact: Prevents bacterial growth and unpleasant odors
templates.ai_explanation: Daily trash removal prevents bacterial growth and unpleasant odors. Full trash bins can attract pests and create unsanitary conditions in the kitchen.

subtasks.title: Remove full trash bag
subtasks.description: Tie and remove the full trash bag

subtasks.title: Clean trash bin
subtasks.description: Wipe down the inside of the trash bin

subtasks.title: Insert new trash bag
subtasks.description: Place a new trash bag in the bin
